channel.title: Im confused
channel.description:
Ok so Id like to use a client because soooo many clients look better than silabs client Also I run a server When ever I try a client out all the ids are different then the item slots so if i want to use a client do i have to completly redo all the item id's to the new id'sones and put them in the correct area?
that just seems like alot of work, and it doesnt seem like other people who host servers do that?
am i correct or am i doing something wrong

item.title: Im confused
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

in item.java

you have to move all the ids to where you want it to go

for example: let’s say an attack cape is 14052

in item.java

you have to find capes and add in 14052

Read full topic
